title: Man Utd fans tell Amorim to 'resign' as flops go 2-0 down at Grimsby
description: MANCHESTER UNITED fans were left seething after the Red Devils went 2-0 down against League Two side Grimsby Town in the Carabao Cup. With the likes of Benjamin Sesko, Matheus Cunha, Amad Diallo, A…
content:
BLUNDER PARK ‘Ruben Amorim has to resign’ – Man Utd fans furious as flops go 2-0 down at League Two Grimsby in Carabao Cup

MANCHESTER UNITED fans were left seething after the Red Devils went 2-0 down against League Two side Grimsby Town in the Carabao Cup.

With the likes of Benjamin Sesko, Matheus Cunha, Amad Diallo, Andre Onana, Manuel Ugarte and Harry Maguire all on the pitch, United conceded twice within the space of eight minutes at 

Blundell Park.

The Sun is your go to destination for the best football, boxing and MMA news, real-life stories, jaw-dropping pictures and must-see video.Like us on Facebook at https://www.facebook.com/TheSunFootball and follow us from our main Twitter account at @TheSunFootball.
summary: Manchester United fans are calling for the resignation of manager Ruben Amorim following a 2-0 defeat against League Two side Grimsby in the Carabao Cup. The team had several key players on the pitch, including Benjamin Sesko, Matheus Cunha, Amad Diallo, Andre Onana, Manuel Ugarte and Harry Maguire.
shortSummary: Managers are furious after their team lost 2-0 to Grimsby, leading to criticism from some within the team and beyond.
